item.title: How to Automatically Archive Twitch Streams - The Hard Way
item.description: If you’re like me, simply downloading Twitch VODs aren’t good enough. The major one for me is that VODs will have copyrighted content muted, so if the stream has a copyrighted song playing, an entire 5+ minute chunk of the video will be muted. You can get around this by streaming the stream to a local file with streamlink. Pretty simple, until you want it to not be. Let’s make it difficult, with powershell scripting, timed scripts, and error handling!
